com.facebook.buck.util.versioncontrol

Interface VersionControlCmdLineInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HgCmdLineInterface, NoOpCmdLineInterface

    public interface VersionControlCmdLineInterface
    Provides meta-data about the version control repository the project being built is using.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String commonAncestor(java.lang.String revisionIdOne, java.lang.String revisionIdTwo) 
      java.lang.String currentRevisionId() 
      boolean hasWorkingDirectoryChanges() 
      boolean isSupportedVersionControlSystem() 
      java.lang.String revisionId(java.lang.String name) 
      long timestampSeconds(java.lang.String revisionId) 

    • Method Detail

      • isSupportedVersionControlSystem

        boolean isSupportedVersionControlSystem()
        Returns:
        true if project is using version control, and we support it (i.e. hg)

      • revisionId

        java.lang.String revisionId(java.lang.String name)
                            throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        name - Bookmark name, e.g. master
        Returns:
        Global revision ID for given name
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • currentRevisionId

        java.lang.String currentRevisionId()
                                   throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns:
        Revision ID for current tip
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • commonAncestor

        java.lang.String commonAncestor(java.lang.String revisionIdOne,
                              java.lang.String revisionIdTwo)
                                throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        revisionIdOne -
        revisionIdTwo -
        Returns:
        Revision ID that is an ancestor for both revisionIdOne and revisionIdTwo
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • hasWorkingDirectoryChanges

        boolean hasWorkingDirectoryChanges()
                                   throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns:
        True if working directory has changes after last commit
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • timestampSeconds

        long timestampSeconds(java.lang.String revisionId)
                      throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        revisionId -
        Returns:
        Unix timestamp of given revisionId (in seconds)
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
